Articles.Content:
So, I decide to start a new career save. I accept 2 contracts and then go to the VAB to build my rocket.

As you can see in the third image, my contracts are gone. I did not complete them. My money count is the same. I have installed Scatterer, EVE (I can't see clouds though, don't know if I installed it correctly), OPM, and Kopernicus. It's annoying as hell. 

Can you please explain how to uninstall the mods? I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game and verifying integrity of game cache. Nothing works. Do I have to pick them out of the folders myself or is there an option in KSP Properties that'll let me do so? I want to uninstall all of them and reinstall Scatterer.

the only way to uninstall mods is to delete their folder in the Game Data folder.

It does look like you may be missing some dependents for those mods, check their threads here to make sure you have everything they require, especially blitzy's toolbar and module manager, those are required by just about everything these days.

Edited September 24, 2016 by Capt. Hunt

So first, when you uninstall the game, you need to delete the whole KSP folder. When uninstalling it by a setup or steam, your mod folders won't be deleted. 

Secondly, try to install your mods by CKAN, this is the most easy way to get your mods right installed and to keep them up to date. 

And just to be sure, how did you get your game?
